short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Purple20 supports integration of DCC games with Roll20, allowing Crawler Companion rolls to be visible in the Roll20 VTT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Purple20 is an extension that supports integration of DCC games with Roll20. It allows Crawler Companion rolls to be visible in the Roll20 VTT
